message.content: Thank you for the detailed insights! I completely agree that focusing on digital literacy, critical thinking, and emotional intelligence is essential for preparing the workforce of the future. The idea of revamping curricula to include these skills, along with fostering partnerships with industry, is particularly compelling. I also appreciate the emphasis on lifelong learning and hands-on experiences, as they can significantly enhance students' readiness for the evolving job market. Itâ€™s clear that educational institutions have a crucial role to play in shaping a workforce that can thrive alongside AI and automation. I'm excited to see how these changes will unfold in the coming years!
